친구초대문구:
LOVEL - Fairy Tales with Your Voice
📚 The best app for busy parents 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

PlayStore : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sayit.yoggo

온보딩:
Hello, Welcome to LOVEL! 
Here, you can discover free books to read and 4,500 points that can 
unlock premium books. Please click on a book you like and start reading!
온보딩-뉴:
In LOVEL, you can read fairytales in your own voice. 
  Now, let's go ahead and record your voice!
달력-툴팁:
You can earn points
through attendance checks!
달력-안내: Attend daily and claim your rewards!
구독-설명:
✅ Read with your voice
✅ Unlock all books
✅ 7-day FREE trial
구독-약관설명-iOS: Subscription Terms: After 7-day free trial, LOVEL monthly subscription is $5.99, automatically renews unless turned off in Account Settings at least 24h before current period ends. Payment is charged to your iTunes account. By tapping Continue, you agree to our
구독-약관설명-안드로이드: After 7-day free trial, LOVEL monthly subscription is $5.99. You can cancel this subscription at any time if you wish.
책-페이지-로딩: Downloading the book, please wait a little while! 📚

points are insufficient.
 You need to purchase additional points.

책만들어봐:
You can listen to this book with your voice.
Would you like to proceed?
오류제보: Please report any errors you find. Thank you!

재녹음-경고:
If you record again, the previous voice will be deleted.
you'll need to recreate the books using the new voice
Do you want to continue?
녹음-푸쉬알림:
Your voice is well recorded 
 We'll let you know by PUSH when it's done
녹음-대본:
In a land not so distant…
Birds brought joy with their morning song
Clouds would gather, hinting winter wouldn't be long
But with every dawn, light made the day bright and strong
Every village, near or far, had a tale, a lifelong bond.
녹음-화면이탈경고:
Do not exit the screen. Your precious voice is being transmitted.
If you leave the screen, the process will be erased.
녹음-안내: Now it's your turn to make your voice heard!
